title: PerkListData
description: A file named 'perks.json' in the root of a mod folder that contains a list of perks to load.

perks.description: A list of perks included in this mod.

PerkData.description: A perk that can be unlocked by the player using perk points to grant certain passive effects.

id.description: A unique internal identifier for this entity. This must not be the same as any other entity of the same type in your mod.

name.description: The name to display in-game for this entity.

level.description: The minimum level requirement to unlock this perk.

iconPath.description: A file path (relative to your mod's folder) to an image file to use for this perk's icon. Can be shared with other perks.

prereq.description: The ID of a perk that must be unlocked before this perk becomes available.

BuffData.description: Various possible effects that will apply when the buff is active.

hazardDamage.description: Modifies the damage the player takes from various types of hazards.

translationSpeed.description: Modifies the speed at which the player can translate Nomai text.

travelMusic.description: Changes the travel music played when flying the ship between planets.

heal.description: Restores a percentage of the player's health.

giveDrop.description: Adds a drop directly to the player's inventory.

custom.description: Defines a custom effect that can be interacted with via the mod API.

HazardDamageEffectData.description: Modifies the damage the player takes from various types of hazards.

type.description: The type of hazard to modify damage for.

add.description: The percentage of the initial damage to add/reduce. E.g. a value of -0.1 means subtract 10% of the base damage from the total.

multiply.description: The percentage to multiply the total damage by. E.g. a value of 0.25 will result in 25% damage, or a 75% reduction.

TranslationSpeedEffectData.description: Modifies the speed at which the player can translate Nomai text.

multiply.description: The percentage to multiply the total translation time by. E.g. a value of 0.25 will result in translating taking 25% of the usual time, or a 75% reduction.

TravelMusicEffectData.description: Changes the travel music played when flying the ship between planets.

audioType.description: An Outer Wilds AudioType value that will be used as the travel music will this buff is active. See https://nh.outerwildsmods.com/reference/audio_enum.html

HealEffectData.description: Restores a percentage of the player's health.

amount.description: The percentage of total health to restore. E.g. 0.2 will restore 20% of maximum health.

GiveDropEffectData.description: Adds a drop directly to the player's inventory.

drop.description: The unique ID of the drop to give.

amount.description: The text to display in the UI for this effect.

CustomEffectData.description: Defines a custom effect that can be interacted with via the mod API.

id.description: A custom value that uniquely identifies this effect, for use with the mod API.

description.description: The text to display in the UI for this effect.
